message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it.

I understand that $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I can only offer $10,500 for the product.

I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $12,000, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I can sell it to you for $11,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value.
Thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am unable to increase my offer beyond $11,000.
